required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of EyeArt Performance With Retinal Cameras
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of EyeArt Performance With Retinal Cameras

brief_summary.textblock: The study evaluates the performance of the EyeArt system for detecting diabetic retinopathy from images captured using retinal cameras and operators.

primary_outcome.measure: Overall agreement between the results from multiple EyeArt operations
primary_outcome.description: Overall agreement is defined as the fraction of cases where the multiple EyeArt operation results agree with each other.

intervention.description: Subjects will undergo retinal imaging before and/or after administration of mydriatic agent
Subjects will be administered mydriatic medication to dilate their pupils.

study_pop.textblock: Study subjects will be enrolled at primary care and/or eye care centers
